natural problem: Express $4.\overline{054}$ as a common fraction in lowest terms.
natural solution: We then have $1000x = 4054.\overline{054}$, so $$ 1000x - x = 4054.\overline{054} - 4.\overline{054} = 4050 \ \ \Rightarrow \ \ x = \frac{4050}{999} = \boxed{\frac{150}{37}}. $$

shows  "x = 150 / 37"

 *)

theorem
fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "x = 4 + 0.054 + 0.00054 + 0.0000054 + ..."
shows  "x = 150 / 37"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
